channel.title: Force Equiped Items
channel.description:
Whats the method for force equip items, 317, 508, 525, or 562+ will work, i can convert it. Just need the simple code snippet.
Thanks
[i]-----------------------------------------------[/i] [i]Rep for Correct Statement[/i]

item.title: Force Equiped Items
item.dc:creator: @Pure_Slay Pure Slay
item.description:
@Pure_Slay wrote:

rip4d:

If you want to change the items you start out equipped with, go into Player.java and scroll down until you see playerEquipment[playerHat] or something like that. Then just change the IDs to your liking.

Lol no, like i said force equip, not starter lol. Like when you do something it force you wear that armorâ€¦ i tried doing

player.getEquipment().get(0).addEquipment(9672); //Hat

Then i added the public void in player.java, but the addEquipment is messed, just need the simple snippet of what i just posted, that works

Read full topic

item.title: Force Equiped Items
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

If you want to change the items you start out equipped with, go into Player.java and scroll down until you see playerEquipment[playerHat] or something like that. Then just change the IDs to your liking.

Read full topic
